name: ESP/ESM Translator Database
summary: An EET file is a text file used by ESP/ESM Translator, a tool used to translate mods for The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, Fallout, and other Bethesda video games. It contains a database that allows players to translate a mod's text into other languages. EET files are primarily plain text files, so they can be opened and edited in any text editor.
